name: Filth (smushy64)
description:
Filth is a first person shooter where you must scavenge for weapons of dubious quality to fight the oncoming horde of monsters. The weapons will have random stats, and spawn in a random position, so utilize your movement and map knowledge to explore and find all of the weapons you can before the next wave starts!

Controls ActionGamepadKeyboardMoveLeft StickW A S DShootRight TriggerLeft ClickCrouch / SlideBLeft CtrlJumpASpacebarPauseStartEscape / Tab Known Issues
  • Sometimes enemies won't die or take damage properly. Restarting will fix this.
  • Pausing and unpausing may sometimes prevent you from using your mouse to aim  temporarily. Pausing and unpausing or clicking may fix this.
  • Explosions from rockets linger longer than their animation would suggest, which leads to taking damage for seemingly no reason
  • WEBGL: The mouse may jump around in browser causing you to sporadically rotate. If this is a problem, the downloadable version does not have this issue.
